title: DroidSet Free v2.8.1 (Android 4.0.3+)
description:
DROIDSET FREE v2.8.1 (Android 4.0.3+) Installer


DroidSet allows you to manage settings on Android phones by providing quick toggling functionality. These functionality allow you to enable or disable Wi-Fi, mobile network, GPS, Bluetooth, screen orientation, flight mode and much more at a touch of a button. When the functionality is activated, you will be presented with some information regarding that functionality.

You can install the APK found in this torrent (See instructions below) or install it from https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=au.com.ckd.droidsetfree.


-------------
What's new:
-------------
v2.8.1:
a. Bug fix.

Seefor more info.


--------------------------
Prerequisite requirement:
--------------------------
1. An unrooted or rooted Android device.

Note: Some features might not work if you don't have a rooted device.

2. Android 4.0.3 (Ice Cream Sandwich) and up.


--------------------------
Steps to install the APK:
--------------------------

1. Android 4 to 7: Go to "Settings | Applications" and tick "Unknown Sources".

Android 8 onwards: Tap "Settings" button when prompted, then follow further instructions to sideload any Android application.


2. Copy the APK onto phone's internal SD card using a Wifi program or directly via the phone's USB connection.


3. Use a file manager like (Root Explorer, etc) to browse to location of saved APK.


4. Tap on APK to install.


Enjoy
